Class EditStoryActivity

  Activity
      ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.EditStoryActivity

public class EditStoryActivity
extends Activity

This Activity allows a story's author to edit a story by adding adding pages, deleting pages, setting the first page, or deleting the story. This class is part of the view of the application. TODO Delete functionality not yet hooked up TODO Help function neeeds to be added
